# TensorFlow 快速入门教程（C 语言中文网）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/tensorflow-kuaisu-rumenjiaocheng-c-yuyan-zhongwenwang
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/tensorflow-kuaisu-rumenjiaocheng-c-yuyan-zhongwenwang
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install tensorflow-kuaisu-rumenjiaocheng-c-yuyan-zhongwenwang
tensorflow-kuaisu-rumenjiaocheng-c-yuyan-zhongwenwang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g tensorflow-kuaisu-rumenjiaocheng-c-yuyan-zhongwenwang
tensorflow-kuaisu-rumenjiaocheng-c-yuyan-zhongwenwang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
